item1.description:
45 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
300 Health
20 Ability Haste

Active - Halting Slash: Lunge a short distance and deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 60%, decaying over 2 seconds (20s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

    Halting Slash's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Kindlegem
item3.description:
200 Health
10 Ability Haste

item4.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item4.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item5.name: Spectre's Cowl
item5.description:
250 Health
25 Magic Resist
  • Incorporeal: After taking damage from a champion, gain 150% base Health Regen for up to 10 seconds (duration increases with damage taken).

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Goredrinker
item0.description:
45 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
150% Base Health Regen

Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (25% Attack Damage + 8% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Spite: Gain 1% Attack Damage for each 5% missing Health (max 15%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Haste.

item1.name: Control Ward
item1.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item2.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item2.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item3.name: Sterak's Gage
item3.description:
50 Attack Damage
400 Health
  • Bloodlust: Dealing damage to or taking damage from a champion grants a stack, restoring (2% max Health | 1.2% max Health for Ranged champions) over 6 seconds.
  • Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 200 Shield (increased by (8% max Health | 4.8% max Health for Ranged champions) per stack of Bloodlust) for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).

    Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.

item0.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
item0.description:
60 Armor
60 Magic Resist
15 Ability Haste

Active - Unbreakable: Gain a (100 + 100% bonus Health) Shield that decays and grow 25% in size for 2.5 seconds. (90s cooldown).
  • Fortify: Taking damage from a champion grants a stack of 5% bonus Armor and 5% bonus Magic Resist for 6 seconds.

    Max 5 stacks; 1 per champion.

item1.name: Randuin's Omen
item1.description:
250 Health
80 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active: Humility: Briefly Slow nearby enemies and reduce their Attack Damage by 10% and Critical Strike Damage by 20% for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).
  • Rock Solid: Reduce incoming damage from Attacks by up to (0.5% max Health), capped at 40% of the attack's damage.

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Stridebreaker
item3.description:
45 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
300 Health
20 Ability Haste

Active - Halting Slash: Lunge a short distance and deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 60%, decaying over 2 seconds (20s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants 30 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

    Halting Slash's dash cannot pass through terrain.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.
